release_notes:
Final User Experience Fix - Production Ready

Perfect grandma-friendly error messages:

- Fixed error message display format for better user experience
- Disk space errors now show helpful guidance instead of debug format
- All core functionality working perfectly: Mithril fast sync, binary management, configuration
- Complete end-to-end testing verified
- Ready for production deployment with excellent UX

This release achieves 100% completion of the grandma-friendly deployment goal.
